projects.title: Digi-Key API Node Application
projects.subtitle: Node.js application
projects.body: Console application that allows the user to pull the data sheets, URLs, and other data using Digi-Key’s API and the part’s identification number. The application then compiles everything together and outputs a file tree for the user to traverse.

projects.title: Common Files Application
projects.subtitle: Full-stack web application
projects.body: Previously hosted on AWS, this web app was made with the intention to distribute common files to those who are given access. This project lost funding, and is not complete, but I learned a lot by building it myself.

projects.title: LukeHW Web Portfolio
projects.subtitle: Displays work and projects, hosted with AWS
projects.body: This Website! Made with React, Material UI, JS, HTML, and CSS; this website displays some of my projects, pictures, and other works that I have contributed to. Feel free to look around.

projects.title: Non-profit Org. Website
projects.subtitle: A simple information website, hosted with AWS
projects.body: This AWS hosted static website displays images and information for the public in the area of service. Made with React, JS, and HTML.

projects.title: Old Personal Website
projects.subtitle: First attempt at designing my own website
projects.body: This was my first real attempt at web development. Built with HTML, CSS, and a small amount of JS. Originally hosted with Forge; this small website displayed basic information and helped me to understand simple web development.

projects.title: Text Based Detective Game
projects.subtitle: Small game made with C
projects.body: Fun text based adventure made for my CIS308 final project. Move around and find clues to advance. Made with C and some C-based gameboy pixel art programs.
